system.description:
You have a connection to both the power of the elements and the divine. Whether these are two separate things or two sides of the same coin, you have nevertheless begun to learn to use them in conjunction. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Wisdom score increases by +1, to a maximum of 20.

  • You can change your elementalist spellcasting ability to Wisdom if you desire. Once made, this choice is permanent.

  • Half your elementalist levels count as cleric levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.s4iiatrup3e3virw]{Channel Divinity} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.zezsezm2e0azb3ty]{Empowered Turning} features.

  • Your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.zhuf06durl8bnmh3]{Turn Undead} feature also affects creatures of the elemental type, and this includes any improved versions such as those granted by Empowered Turning.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in cleric, 3 levels in elementalist
